test.name: Bucket Exists should not if No Such Volume

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'timeout 15 ozone sh bucket info o3://om/no-such-volume/any-bucket 2>&1'.
${output} = VOLUME_NOT_FOUND Volume no-such-volume is not found
